description.text: this message file contains message for [name] package

msg.text: PFR Interface Logic is used in the design, but no PFR Programming Logic is found. Please use both of them together. \n
PFR Programming Logic is used in the design, but no PFR Interface Logic is found. Please use both of them together. \n
Neither PFR Interface Logic nor PFR Programming Logic is found in the design . Please use both of them together. \n
Cannot use PFR IO '$$s' as a port name in the top design.
